translations.chinese: 六月，羽已破走彭越，聞漢復軍成皋，乃引兵西拔滎陽城，生得周苛。
translations.english: In the sixth month, Xiang Yu had already defeated and routed Peng Yue. He heard that Han had returned his army to Chenggao, so he led troops west and captured Xingyang city, taking Zhou Ke alive.

translations.chinese: 羽謂苛：「為我將，以公為上 將軍，封三萬戶。」
translations.english: Xiang Yu said to Ke: "Be my general. I will make you supreme general and enfeoff you with 30,000 households."

translations.chinese: 周苛罵曰：「若不趨降漢，今為虜矣！
translations.english: Zhou Ke cursed: "If you do not quickly surrender to Han, you will now become a captive!
You are no match for King Han."

translations.chinese: 羽亨周苛，并殺樅公，而虜韓王信，遂圍成皋。
translations.english: Xiang Yu boiled Zhou Ke and also killed Lord Song. He captured King Han Xin and then surrounded Chenggao.
